participant_1.background:
I enjoy reading mysteries.
I grew up on a large farm.
I drive a truck for a living.
My favorite color is blue.
I have seven children.

participant_2.background:
I just had surgery.
I love playing frisbee.
I have two large dogs.
I eat sardines for breakfast daily.
I never finished high school.

content.text: Hi there, I'm John! What's your name?
Hi John, I'm Sarah. It's nice to meet you!
Nice to meet you too, Sarah! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to play frisbee, and I'm also a big fan of mysteries.
That's awesome! I love playing frisbee too. I'm also a big fan of mysteries. Have you read any good mysteries lately?
I just finished reading "The Silent Patient" by Alex Michaelides, and I really enjoyed it. It was a very suspenseful and well-written book.
I've heard good things about that book. I'll have to check it out. What's your favorite part about reading mysteries?
I love the feeling of being on the edge of my seat, trying to figure out who the killer is. I also love the way that mysteries can make me think about things in a different way.
I agree! Mysteries are so much fun to read. I've been reading a lot of mysteries lately, and I'm really enjoying them.
That's great! What are some of your favorite mysteries?
I really enjoyed "The Girl on the Train" by Paula Hawkins and "The Woman in the Window" by A.J. Finn. They were both really suspenseful and kept me guessing until the very end.
I've heard good things about both of those books. I'll have to check them out.
You should! They're both great mysteries.
Thanks for the recommendation! I'm always looking for new books to read.
Me too! I love reading, so I'm always looking for new books to add to my list.
What are some of your other hobbies?
I love playing video games, and I also enjoy watching movies and TV shows.
I love playing video games too! I'm a big fan of the Assassin's Creed series.
I've never played Assassin's Creed, but I've heard good things about it.
It's a lot of fun! It's a historical action-adventure game where you play as an assassin who travels through time to different historical periods.
That sounds really cool! I might have to check it out.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Thanks for the recommendation! I'm always looking for new games to play.
You're welcome! I'm always happy to recommend games to people.
Thanks! It's been great talking to you, Sarah.
It's been great talking to you too, John.
